Alors,alors...Comment décrire ce jeu ?
Vous voulez un jeu avec un gameplay original, une histoire excellente et marrante avec plus de 3 heures de jeux de solo et + de 10 heures de multi a seulement 20 euros ?
Et bah Portal 2 est fait pour vous, moi perso je l'ai découvert a sa sortie et j'ai eu le temps de faire plus de 200 heures de jeux ! Pourquoi ? Parce que c'est l'un des meilleurs jeux auxquels j'ai jamais joué pratiquement unique dans son genre et très plaisant ! En plus il y a pas si longtemps que ça (au moments ou j'ai modifié mon évaluation ) il y a environ 1 ans ou moins je sais plus, ils ont rajouté un éditeur de tests (niveaux) ce qui rajoute...heu...des centaines d'heures de jeux en plus !

Franchement recommandé ! 10/10 / Rien a redire, ce jeu est un chef d'oeuvre ! <3

PS : Vous allez vous attacher tellement au jeu que vous n'arriverais pas à le quitter ;)
Интересная
Збс игра.

This is a masterpiece of a game, one of the best puzzle games you'll ever play not only because the challenges are clever, but because the game manages to deliver even more than you would expect.
The atmosfere is great, the soundtrack is good, the characters and their lines are sharp. These guys really know about storytelling and you'll be curious, angry, scared and laughing through the whole playthrough.

I recommend playing the first Portal game, this one being a direct sequel to the story of its predecessor.

GO FOR THE COOP TOO. The cooperative campaign is a whole different experience with new characters and levels. You can customize your coop characters and there are tons of community levels to download through Steam Workshop.

I was new to the portal series, even though I've been playing Counter-Strike Source for a long time. Portal 2 was a bit strange in the beginning, but later on... Dayum, the story is so tense. Love it! Love it! Love it!
хороший сюжет)

Fantastic puzzle game that took about 9.0 hours for me to complete the main story line. Humorous and entertaining story line that's not to be missed. I have yet to try out the co-op testing center but am looking forward to it. The game was a fantastic value over the Holiday sales event.
Fave game - Absolutely fantastic stroyline, tonnes of twists and turns to keep you hooked for hours

9/10 - Few Bugs and Glitch's.

Гораздо хуже первого, спасибо консолям. Из-за них тут больше нет точности установки порталов что сделало игру легкой и не интересной. Режим испытания убрали что просто омерзительно, могли бы хоть для PC оставить. Тут только за счет кооператива интересно. Игра в целом ничего но я ожидал большего от полноценной второй части. Она на 1 раз, что сюжет что геймплей. 2й раз уже ничего не заставит вас ее проходить. Глупый сюжет, простой геймплей, не интересный кооператив.

Absolutely amazing puzzle game. The key word here is puzzle. Do not get this if you are looking for a first-person shooter. However, the voice-overs and clean mechanics may be enough for diehard fps fans to get into the puzzle genre.

"Portal 2" безусловно революционная игра от Valve и одновременно прекрасная эволюция первой части. Это едиснтвенная игра на моей памяти, где физические головоломки тесно связаны с художественностью, юмором, чудесной подачей и технологичностью исполнения. 
Отдельно радует кооперативный режим, который мы с другом прошли на одном дыхании, и который я рекомендую не как второстепенную ветвь от основной компании, а как максимально первое, ибо те эмоции которые вы получите будут несравненны. 

Игра умная и мозги разминает не хуже математики. Дегенератам же в сторону. Для жаждущих и желающих ощутить чувство прекрасного - добро пожалость. Своих денег безоговорочно стоит.

Настоятельно рекомендую.
I have possibly rage un-intalled this game at least 5 times. 10/10 would reccomend.
Awesome!

This was a perfect sequal to the first part. There is nothing else to say about this but if you like Portal 1 you will like Portal 2. No doubt about that.

Essa review vai ser basicamente inútil, não tem absolutamente nada que alguém poderia falar pra não indicar Portal 2 pra qualquer jogador, é mais uma review positiva em um mar delas.

An absolute masterpiece. The story and humor are presented incredibly well and make for an amazing experience. Valve also took great care with the aesthetic design. Aperture still has the pristine look from the first game, but nature and time have started to take over the facility. Players can also see the inner workings and vastness of the facility, such as the tiles and panels that rotate into place upon entering a test chamber. In addition to the main story mode, there is also a separate multiplayer mode where players take on test chambers as two Aperture robots named "Atlas" and "P-Body". The story, visuals, puzzles, and new features make for an outstanding sequel.
It's epic, logical adventure. You should use your brainzzz)

Singleplayer e multiplayer com história, cenário, gráfico e testes excelentes e originais. Apesar de ser uma sequencia do Portal, o Portal 2 continua sendo inovador. Um dos melhores jogos que já joguei.

It's Portal 2. If you haven't played this game yet, you need to stop whatever it is that you are doing and play this game RIGHT NOW!

This game is really fun and challenging with little bits of humor throughout. Even though I beat it in about 4 hours, it still offers more content such as chambers that are created by players. Also, you can keep working for acheivements because not all are required to beat the game. (I only completed about 30% and won) I would highly recommend Portal 2 and the original Portal. However, I would wait for a big sale to buy it since it's not much content for the price.

I spent hours on this game on the Xbox 360 platform and when I seen it on sale on Steam, I just had to buy it. Valve know how to make an interesting game and by the beard of Zeus, if you don't like GLaDoS then be gone!

Overall, incredible game if you like fast paced and puzzle games. The storyline is very good as well, although you need to have played the first Portal game to understand a lot of it. If you have played it, and are finished this one, I suggest looking for all the hidden bits like the hatch doors, etc. Some fun hidden things there for all you Valve gamers.
